data.name: ServiceNow Center of Excellence
data.description: Serviceberry's ServiceNow Center of Excellence delivers comprehensive workflow automation and IT service management solutions. The CoE specializes in ITSM, CSM, FSM, HRSD, ITOM, ITBM, and Security Operations implementations across the full ServiceNow platform. With extensive experience in ServiceNow integrations, Smart Launch Kit frameworks, and proven program delivery methodologies, the CoE enables organizations to achieve streamlined operations, enhanced productivity, and improved service delivery through ServiceNow's comprehensive digital platform.

services.description: Customer service platform implementation with case management and customer portals

services.name: Field Service Management (FSM)
services.description: Field service operations management with mobile capabilities and dynamic scheduling

services.name: IT Operations Management (ITOM)

data.businessValue: Serviceberry's ServiceNow CoE delivers significant business value through streamlined IT operations, enhanced service delivery, and improved productivity. The CoE enables organizations to achieve 35% reduction in fulfillment time, 26% rise in ticket resolution per day, 100% compliance in field services, 70% increase in productivity, 40% reduction in case load, 45% less time in administrative tasks, and 100% automation of onboarding and offboarding processes. Through comprehensive ServiceNow implementations, organizations realize improved operational efficiency, enhanced user experience, reduced manual effort, and measurable cost savings.
